name: Star Catcher (itch) (OzoneGameDev)
description:
Made for GDevelop Weekend Jam #2: Mobile Edition. The theme was “Leaderboard”

 Star Catcher is a simple game where your goal is to catch stars that are falling down. Move the platform with ‘a’ and ‘d’ or left and right keys. You can also press the buttons on screen if you’re using a touchscreen device

 Try to get the highest score on the leaderboard!

Play online on liluo.io > https://liluo.io/ozonegamedev/star-catcher
